title: Alchemy expands into carbon road components, from all-road wheels to cockpits
content:
Alchemy had teased us recently with the idea that they had some lightweight carbon components in the works, beyond their latest road & shape-shifting mountain bikes. But we were still surprised to see such a broad new road & all-road offering of carbon wheels, seatposts, handlebars & stems. Alchemy carbon road, all-road wheels & cockpit [â€¦]

The post Alchemy expands into carbon road components, from all-road wheels to cockpits appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
